ai-patthana15.24:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.24:0.3_0: Only bodily formations are associated with good results.
ai-patthana15.24:1.1_0: Neither rooted in skillful qualities, doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.24:2.1_0: A cause or reasons to give rise to a cause or condition for the sake of unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana15.24:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.24:3.1_0: Not unprofitable thoughts, lacking any cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.24:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
